discussionComments.subject: CS 61A
discussionComments.content: This is a test comment for CS 61A. The course covers fundamental programming concepts and is a great introduction to computer science!

discussionComments.subject: CS 61B
discussionComments.content: This is a test comment for CS 61B. Data structures and algorithms are covered in depth here. Make sure to practice coding regularly!

discussionComments.subject: CS 61A
discussionComments.content: Has anyone found the homework assignments challenging? I'm struggling with the recursion problems in week 3.

discussionComments.subject: MATH 1A
discussionComments.content: Calculus can be tough but the professors here are really helpful. Office hours are definitely worth attending!

discussionComments.subject: CS 70
discussionComments.content: Discrete mathematics and probability theory are core to this course. The proofs can be tricky but very rewarding once you understand them.

discussionComments.subject: CS 61B
discussionComments.content: The project assignments are really well-designed. They help you understand how to apply the data structures in real scenarios.

discussionComments.subject: PHYSICS 7A
discussionComments.content: Mechanics and thermodynamics are covered in this course. The lab sessions are really helpful for understanding the concepts.

discussionComments.subject: CS 61A
discussionComments.content: The Python programming language is really intuitive once you get the hang of it. Don't be afraid to experiment with the code!

discussionComments.subject: ECON 1
discussionComments.content: Introduction to economics covers both micro and macro concepts. The supply and demand graphs can be confusing at first but make sense with practice.

discussionComments.subject: CS 70
discussionComments.content: The midterm was challenging but fair. Make sure to review all the proof techniques and practice problems from the textbook.

discussionComments.subject: MATH 1B
discussionComments.content: Integration techniques and series are the main focus. The integration by parts method is particularly useful for many problems.

discussionComments.subject: CS 61B
discussionComments.content: The Git version control system is essential for the projects. Make sure to commit your work regularly and write meaningful commit messages.

discussionComments.subject: CHEM 1A
discussionComments.content: General chemistry covers atomic structure, bonding, and stoichiometry. The periodic table becomes your best friend in this course!

discussionComments.subject: CS 61A
discussionComments.content: The discussion sections are really valuable. Don't skip them - the TAs provide great insights and help with debugging your code.

discussionComments.subject: STAT 2
discussionComments.content: Introduction to statistics covers probability distributions, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis. R programming is used for data analysis.
